org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote

Interface Streamable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object this class (de-)serializes
    All Superinterfaces:
    NetworkChangeObservable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteBuffer, RemoteComparable, RemoteField, RemoteString

    public interface Streamable<T>
extends NetworkChangeObservable
    Eases serialization and deserialization of Objects.

    • Method Summary

        Returns:

      • set

        Sets the object this Streamable contains.

      • set

        void set(T value,
       boolean overrideChange)
        Sets the object this Streamable contains.
        Parameters:
        value - the object this Streamable shall contain from now on
        overrideChange - If true, the check if the object contained by this Streamable has changed, will be performed regardless of other conditions.

        Returns:
